text: Kumbia Kings (or Los Kumbia Kings) are a reggaeton band formed by A.B. Quintanilla III in 1999. They won several Latin Grammy Awards for their albums. In 2007, Quintanilla III formed a new band called Kumbia All Starz because of conflicts from other band members. Frankie J became a successful R&B; singer after he left to become a solo artist. Selena's widower Chris Perez joined both of the bands but left in 2010 to start his own band with Joe Ojeda, originally a keyboardist from Selena y Los Dinos. == Other websites == *Official Website *Kumbia All Starz Website *Kumbia Kings Billboard *www.KumbiaKingsBlog.com Category:Musical groups from Texas Category:Reggae bands Category:Hip hop bands Category:American R&B; bands Category:Latin music Category:People from Corpus Christi, Texas Category:Mexican musical groups Category:Reggaeton Category:Latin Grammy Award winners Category:Musical groups established in 1999 Category:1999 establishments in North America Category:1990s establishments in Mexico Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2006 Category:2000s disestablishments in Mexico Category:Musical groups established in 2009 Category:2000s establishments in Mexico Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2010 Category:2010 disestablishments in Mexico
title: Kumbia Kings
